page.title: 14At the Baker's Shop
page.content: In the Bakers they have all sorts of cakes of various sizes. Most customers prefer brown bread. The Baker's shop sells 5,000 loaves of bread a week. They sell white and brown bread, Hovis and cobbler loaves. Cakes are made with flour and fresh cream is added. The best-selling birthday cake is with the "Care Bears" on. Mr. Holt has been a Baker for 12 years. They also sell tea, coffee and canned drinks. The employees start work at 5am. and finish at 6pm. The most popular sandwich filling is cheese and chicken.The size of the shop is 25 metres by 6 metres. On a weekday, 500 customers come in, but on Saturdays up to 1000 people shop there. They use 3 tons of flour in each days baking. Upstairs, birthday cakes are decorated.
